info.description: Operations to retrieve materials data contributed to MP
info.title: MPContribs API

get.description: If a string is provided via the search parameter, `title`, `description`, and `authors` are searched using a MongoEngine/MongoDB text index. Provide a space-separated list to the search query parameter to search for multiple words. For more, see https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/text-search/.

parameters.description: string to search for in title, authors, description
parameters.name: search

200.description: list of provenance entries with fields project, title, and authors

ApiKeyAuth.description: MP API key to authorize requests
ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-KEY
